meanings.def: a small group of people within a larger one, whose members have some different aims and beliefs to those of the larger group
examples: There are rival factions within the administration.
He brokered a ceasefire agreement between the warring factions.
the dominant faction within the government
the largest faction in the civil war

meanings.def: opposition, disagreement, etc. that exists between small groups of people within an organization or political party
examples: a party divided by faction and intrigue

meanings.def: films, books, etc. that combine fact with fiction (= imaginary events)
